name: type_performance_get_trailing_returns
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches the trailing returns in the Performance tab for a specified ETF or FUND.

securityid.description: The security ID obtained from the .../market/v2/get-returns endpoint.

type.description: The type of security. Must be one of 'etf' or 'fund'.

duration.description: The time duration for the returns. Must be one of 'daily', 'monthly', or 'quarterly'. Defaults to 'daily'.
